rukus.text: 21|11|Ikaga ni ware wa, ōku no aku o okonatte ita toshi o horoboshite, sonoatoni-betsu no min o tateta ka.
21|12|Sorede ware no chōbatsu (ga kudaru no) o kanjiru to, mi nasai. Kare-ra wa soko kara nige (yō to su)ru.
21|13|Nigete wa naranai. Tanoshinda tokoro, anata gata no sumai ni kaere. Anata gata wa jinmon sa rerudearou.
21|14|Kare-ra wa itta. `Ā , nasakenai, watashi-tachi wa hontōni fugi no todeshita.'
21|15|Soshite kare-ra no kono sakebigoe wa, ware ga kare-ra o nekosogi metsu poshi hinokietayō ni chinmoku sa seru made yamanakatta.
21|16|Ware wa ten to ji, mata sonoaida ni aru mono o, tawamure ni tsukutta node wanai.
21|17|Moshi ware ga tawamure o nozomi, kari ni sō surunaraba, waga tedjikana mono (hi busshitsu-tekina reitekina mono) kara erandadearou.
21|18|Iya, ware wa shinri o kyogi ni nagetsukeru to, sono atama o kudaku. Mi nasai. Kyogi wa shōmetsu suru. Anata gataga (ware ni tsuite) iu koto koso, anata gata ni tori wazawaidearu.
21|19|Ten to ji no subete no mono wa, kare no yūdearu. Mata sono sokkin ni iru mono (tenshi) wa, kare ni tsukaete kōmande mo naku, tsukare mo shiranai.
21|20|Kare-ra wa mainichi maiban ni kare o tatae, yasumu koto o shiranai.
21|21|Soretomo kare-ra wa,(shisha o) yomigaera su koto no dekiru kamigami o chijō kara eta no ka.

21|22|Moshi, sono (tenchi no)-kan ni arrā igai no kamigami ga attanaraba, sorera wa kitto konran shitadearou. Sorede gyokuza no shu, kare-ra ga tonaeru mono no ue ni (takaku imasu) arrā o tatae nasai.
21|23|Kare wa, sono okonawa reta koto ni tsuite, jinmon o ukeru koto wanai. Daga kare-ra koso jinmon sa reru nodearu.

21|24|Soretomo kare-ra wa, kare o sashioite soto no kamigami o agameta no ka. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata no shōko o dashite mi nasai. Kore wa watashi to tomoni iru mono e no kunkaideari, mata izen no sedai no mono e no kunkaidearu.'Daga kare-ra no ōku wa kono shinri o rikai dekizu ni somuki saru.
21|25|Anata izen ni mo, ware ga noko wa shita shito ni wa, hitoshiku,`ware no soto ni kami wanai,dakara ware ni tsukaeyo.' To keiji shita.
21|26|Kare-ra wa,`jihibukaki okata wa ko o mōke raremasu.' To itta. Ā mottainai. Iya,(kare-ra tenshi wa) eiyo aru shimo bedearu.
21|27|Kare-ra (tenshi-tachi) wa, kare yori saki ni tsugeru koto mo naku, mata kare no meirei ni motodzuite kōdō suru dakedearu.
21|28|Kare wa, kare-ra (tenshi) izen ni aru mono mo,-igo ni aru mono o mo shitte ora re, kare ga ukeireru mono no soto wa, torinashi o shinai. Kare-ra (tenshi) wa kare ni osore tsukaeru.
21|29|Moshi kare-ra no naka ni,`hontōni watashi wa, kare to wa betsu no kamidearu.' To iu mono ga areba, ware wa kono yōna mono o, jigoku de mukuiru. Fugi o okonau mono ni ko no yō ni mukuiru.
